entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -6.8°C
Wind: WSW 34 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this afternoon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 7 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 28 January 2023
